CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(OR( Not(APT_Contracted_Line_Item__c), Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Name == "Post Billpay",TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.APT_Product_type__c) == "Priority Product",TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.APT_Product_type__c) == "Workforce Verification",TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.APT_Product_type__c) == "Startrack",TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.APT_Product_type__c) == "AP Global Solutions", Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Name == "SecurePay", TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Product_Level_3__c) == "StarTrack", TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Product_Level_3__c) == "AP Global Solutions") ) , HYPERLINK("/apex/C__APT_ManageLodgementPoint?lineItemId="&Id&"&Id="&Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__c, IMAGE(IF (OR(APT_Added_LP__c, Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.APT_Added_Generic_LP__c), "/resource/APT_LPReuiredGreen_Cart","/resource/APT_LPReuiredRed_Cart"),"Add LP"),"_top"),
IF( AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__LineType__c , 'Option')), Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryLine__c, OR(Not(APT_Contracted_Line_Item__c), Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Name == "Post Billpay",TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.APT_Product_type__c) == "Priority Product",TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.APT_Product_type__c) == "Workforce Verification",TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.APT_Product_type__c) == "Startrack",TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.APT_Product_type__c) == "AP Global Solutions", Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Name == "SecurePay", TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Product_Level_3__c) == "StarTrack", TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.Product_Level_3__c) == "AP Global Solutions")) , IMAGE("/resource/APT_NoLPRequired_Cart","No LP Required"), null))
CustomField.label: Lodgement Point
